name: seb
command: let day = new Date().getDay(); let days = ["Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday"]; let string = (day == 6 || day == 0) ?   `It is ${days[day]}, you won't see Seb here today` :   `It is ${days[day]}, you should see Seb here today. If not, consult channel admin.`;  print(string)
